segments.text: Good morning , John . Have you finished reading the novel by Dickens borrowed from the library ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I caught a cold two days ago . I only finish reading half of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry to hear that . How are you feeling now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How many days do you plan to finish reading it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About more three days , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . After three days , I will come to you for it .
segments.speaker: S1
